Class DateFormatHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.util.date.DateFormatHelper

public final class DateFormatHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Utilities for formatting a ChronoDate into different date representations.

chad takahashi

Parameters:

pad

public java.lang.String pad(int num)
Returns a 0-padded 2-digit number from the specified integer (e.g. pad(6) returns "06", pad(59) returns "59").

tenthOfSecond

public java.lang.String tenthOfSecond(ChronoDate d)
Formats hour:minute:second:1/10sec (e.g. "23:56:05:04").

Parameters:
d - - The date to be formatted

twoDigitYear

public java.lang.String twoDigitYear(ChronoDate d)
Formats a 2 digit year string from the specified date. For example, the date '2006-05-25' returns the string "06".
